result.execSummary:
Jonathon L Adams was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Jonathon L Adams was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jonathon L Adams

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Jonathon L Adams not in court.  Robert S. Repischak appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Court Reporter: Sandra Campbell.  Def has been extradited.  dismiss

Defendant Jonathon L Adams in court, in custody.  Robert S Repischak appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Sandra Campbell.
Defendant is to be extradited to IL.
Defendant does not want Public Defender representation and would like to proceed without counsel.
BTC:  Proceed without counsel.
Defense waives extradition.
Colloquy conducted w/ defendant re: rights.
BTC:  Extradition granted.  Review hearing scheduled for March 31, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Review hearing on March 31, 2014 at 08:30 am.
